#summary A simple display widget

=!ImageFrame==

*package:* jaitools.utils

==Description==

This is a simple Swing image display widget used in the jai-tools example programs. Image pixel values for the mouse cursor position are displayed in the status bar.

==Examples of use==

To display an image...
{{{
RenderedImage img = ...
ImageFrame frame = new ImageFrame(img, "Image is everything");
frame.setVisible(true);
}}}

To display one image, but take the pixel values displayed by the status bar from another image with the same bounds...
{{{
RenderedImage dataImage = ...
RenderedImage displayImage = ...
ImageFrame frame = new ImageFrame(displayImage, dataImage, "Image is everything");
}}}
